name: Remove Explosion Flash
author: rainy
description:
Remove the flash of explosives.

This mod removes the screen flash of all explosives.

All explosives in l4d2 have a red flash on the screen when they explode.
It obscures the screen momentarily, so it interferes.
Therefore, this mod removes it to provide a clear vision.
And this has a slight frame boost if you detonate a lot of explosives.
When it explodes, it is better to see fragments of zombies flying away. :D

It works best with RocketDude mutation!

How to use this
  1. Please subscribe to this mode.
  2. Run the game. (If the game is already running, please run it again.)

name: （香草语音包）Vanilla voice pack for Rochelle
author: Amatsukaze
description:
简介：
Nekopara的香草语音替换的Rochelle的语音~
包含所有基础语音，不包含人物对话语音。
这个mod没有和官方文件重名，所以订阅后不会有任何效果和影响。

===========================================================

人物mod
香草

===========================================================

B站视频浏览:
https://www.bilibili.com/video/av41711170

===========================================================

食用方法：
1、订阅此mod，在游戏中下载完成后退出游戏，在workshop中找到VPK文件。
2、下载GCFS拆包工具，这个工具专门拆开VPK文件。可以来QQ裙下载
3、打开vpk文件之后直接舔把vanilla文件夹拖出来。
4、找到你求生的安装目录不知道的打开steam→求生右键查看属性→本地文件→浏览本地文件
5、对应着刚才的vanilla文件夹里的路径，找求生官方文件路径，把官方路径最后一个producer的文件夹删掉或者拖出去备份。
6、将vanilla里最后那个producer文件夹直接拖进求生刚才的producer文件夹同一个目录下。
7、启动游戏，打开控制台输入snd_rebuildaudiocache再等待自动跳出控制台，自动跳出控制台之后输入exit退出游戏。
8、语音包替换完成！！还是不会的小伙伴，b站有教程哦~

===========================================================

最后
温馨提示：配合香草人物mod食用效果更佳~~
祝各位小伙伴hentai游戏愉快~~记得点个赞再走呀QAQ~~要是点下收藏更好啦~~

name: V22 Osprey
author: Lt. Rocky
description:
COACH IS GOIN' FOR A RIIIIIIIIDE.

The helicopter gets it rough. If Francis were to have any lasting influence in the world of fiction, its that helicopters must by inexplicable law suffer his vindictive ire and fractions. The helicopter is high-flying but at the same time not speedy enough that it can fill the role of dangling conveniently over an area should said area be large enough in size. Combine such convenience with the fact a helicopter is usually powered by enough octane fuel that should it ever fall prey to anything like, say, a sudden-appearing missile, that it'll go down with a shower of magnificent destruction should anything terrible ever befall the whirly thing, it's often the perfect target to Writer McBoring and his many woodland friends of Boring McWriters for quick establishment of what is considered a powerful army falling victim to whatever it may happen to be against, be it zombies, clones, zombie clones or Margret Thatcher, with a dazzling display of Hollywood destruction alongside an easy roller coaster ride to whatever happens to be riding inside it at the time, it never occurring to writers that the world-class military engineers who design the things were probably aware of its obvious vulnerabilities, and as such stuffed it with enough counter-measures that if you were to ever witness one falling under rocket attack, it'd look as if the thing were explosively ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ flares and spotlights like a hyper-sensitive action fetish that was on a supply run to a Pink Floyd concert.

This a V22 Osprey, a half-helicopter, half-plane, half-Peter Cullen contraption, piloted by the two most qualified people in the universe, and anyone who questions otherwise will turn around to find themselves being stared down by those people in helicopter pilot helmets holding baseball bats, to then be used in the next flare expulsion.

This will replace the MH-53J seen at the beginning of Dead Centre and the ending of The Parish, as well as any community-made campaigns that make use of the model, including but not limited to Day Break, Deadenator, Dead Series, Farewell Chenming[www.gamemaps.com] Freezer Burn[www.gamemaps.com], Overkill, Run to the Hills[www.gamemaps.com], Suicide Blitz and Warcelona. This model was reanimated from scratch by myself, with many animated components to the aircraft.

Do enjoy.

Credits:

Call of Duty: Ghosts - Osprey
Payday 2 - John "♥♥♥♥ You" Wick!
Sonic & All-Stars Racing: Transformed - Pilot Helmets!

BlooCobalt - Keith!
EdisLeado - John Wick's fancy gloves
Salad - John Wick rig
Lt. Rocky - Compile; Osprey Animation; Shading

name: Star Wars Red Lightsaber [Baseball Bat]
author: Nicky_Da_B
description:
Star Wars

In the days of the Old Republic the color of your blade signified your role in the Jedi Order. Red blades were the exception. Red blades were synthetic crystals created to be more powerful and deadly than the natural crystals. As such they were often used by the Sith. Red crystals weren't unheard of in the Jedi Order, but due to their association to the Sith, there was a taboo associated with using them.

Famous wielders of the red blade:
  • Darth Vader
  • Darth Maul
  • Kylo Ren

Part of the L4D2 Star Wars Project from Nicky_Da_B. This is a weapon mod that replaces the baseball bat model with a red single bladed lightsaber. Live out your Star Wars fantasy in L4D2 today!

This mod includes:
  • a custom model
  • custom textures
  • custom sounds
  • custom hud icon


Download Nicky_Da_B's other L4D2 content here: Nicky_Da_B's L4D2 workshop

Shoot to explode: These are explosive barrels, stay away from them when they explode or else they will down you. Blue Coin +5% Health Pink Coin +15% Health Orange Coin +45% Health



Use the tools to build mine traps (only affect common infected but can down you if near the explosion radius)



The Blue Mine will not explode on shot only touch The Pink Mine will explode on shot and touch



Pink Crates drop items Red Crates drop healthkits

name: MW2 RPG-7 (for GL)
author: Alex_D #NoWar
description:
RPG-7 from CoD: Modern Warfare 2

Note to self: there is a Russian description I will now have to be updating too. FML.

Originating from the Soviet Union, this is hands down the most popular "bad guys" anti-tank solution, due to its simplicity, reliablility, and cheapness. An American company, AirTronic, even produces their own versions of the RPG-7, which are lighter, have better ergonomics, and have the ability to mount computerized sighting systems. You know, just in case they capture a cash of PG-7 grenades and run out of SMAWs and/or Javelins.

Replaces the Grenade Launcher (model and sounds)

Meant mainly as a birthday present for my IRL friend, this was THE weapon that kept him out of "prestiging" for a while. Includes the MW2 sounds and a custom projectile model, though its physics and general behaviour is unaltered. Said grenade (grenade!) only leaves a smoke trail for about a second and starts arching fast; presumably those are cheap crappy PG-7s made in Trashistan.

name: Left 4 MLG
author: 󠀡󠀡󠀡⁧⁧1x5x7
description:
DISCLAIMER: Some sounds may appear very loud. Please play with Headphones and low volume.
To make this mod work properly, please deactivate other mods that may conflict with Left 4 MLG.

This mod is considered to be combined with other mods. It's deliberately not taking over the whole Left 4 Dead 2 experience.

Left 4 MLG is a HUGE sound/UI modification that replaces a total of 158 audio-, 9 UI- and 3 script files. It replaces various sound effects, music and UI with "MLG memes".
  • 158 audio files including music have been replaced. Mostly affected are Special Infecteds, but also the Concert, weapons, explosions, etc..
  • The main menu icons have been replaced with more fitting content. The "Left 4 Dead 2 Logo" as seen on the background also has been replaced.
  • Two script files (should) raise the volumes of hitmarker sounds you can hear if you shoot any Common Infecteds. One script replaces the ingame names of each Survivor.

This content is copyrighted. It is prohibited to reupload it.

name: Makise Kurisu
author: Vanyarin
description:
CURRENT SKIN VERSION: v2a2 (Testing Version) - Read Changelog/Updates here!
REPLACES: Nick

P. D.: This version is fully playable and perfectly stable, I won't upgrade it to v2_1 for the time being until I figure out how to deal with attachments.

This mod was a complete pain in the butt to make, I spent over 40+ hours (yes you heard right) of constantly rigging, compiling and testing, at one point the mod was broken and originally compiled for Rochelle, but that caused gamecrashes that I couldn't fix, trying to compile it for Nick somehow fixed this issue so that's why I decided to rig the model for Nick instead. Ah Source...

Covering over 15+ saves, 8+ backups and over 9+ backup .vpk files, I have finally finished "my premium first submission" into the Left 4 Dead 2 workshop, rather than just uploading fixes for other models, this is my very own skin, worked on it myself and now its fully ready and working for your enjoyment!

The following skin replaces Nick from the Left 4 Dead 2 gang with Makise Kurisu from Steins;Gate, model comes with a few goodies/treats I added in just for you guys:

- First Person Arms
- Boomer bile textures whenever you get vomited/covered
- Jigglebones for her hair and tie (thanks gkuo88 for telling me how to add these in!)
- Custom HUD Icons I edited myself
- Zoey's animations instead of Nick's (which work online)

This is the first time I deal with jigglebones and boomer bile textures, while they may not be perfect they are presentable and work alright.

Now, credits list is kinda big so Imma start listing it here now, these guys are cool beans!

- Vanya: Rigged the model, edited HUD icons and pretty much most of the work done for the rig
- Kakomiki: Original model maker, created for MMD
- Devostator: Ported the model from MMD into another game, from which I then took that port into here
- gkuo88: Taught me how to add jigglebones to a model
- Juls: Helped me test this model since its old versions and provided some feedback which helped me improving this rig as much as I could
- Theuaredead: Provided the fix needed to upload stuff to the workshop as it is currently broken (thank you Valve)

TO-DO LIST:

- Edit the attachments (pistols in holster, adrenaline) so they aren't floating and instead they are attached to the model.
- Maybe add face animations, maybe, I don't know how to do any of these so if someone could tell me how to, I'd deeply appreciate it :p

NOTE: I did not include the file so that Nick's name is replaced with Kurisu's name because it may conflict with other add-ons you may have, if you guys really want me to, I will add the file that replaces Nick's name.

Thanks to all the people who supported this mod while it was being made, and thanks to you for downloading it/checking it out!
Game on!

These Tin Cans can be seen mostly at the start of the Dead Air and No Mercy campaigns, but also in a lot of Custom Campaigns. Enjoy :D

● 10 HD 2048x2048 Ammo Can Textures (Incl. Rusty, New, Campbell's, Tuna etc.)
● Highly detailled light reflections
● "True RNG Uneven" : You have 1/2 chance of getting the classic Tin Can and 1/2 chance of getting any other.

Each map, you'll have a 1/2 chance of getting the classic HD tin can and a 1/2 chance of getting any of the other 9 tin can design ;)

name: 22 Tic Tac Pills (RNG)
author: A little Eileen
description:
Update 2020
I added 6 new flavors (incl. Tic-Tac Gum), SYS (Select Your Skins) support, and changed the RNG.

Update 2016
I added 3 new flavors since you guys did like that mod a lot :D - Banana, Piña Colada and Mint Rush. I also fixed some minor light bugs and a bug on the back etiquette

This mod is the ultimate remaster of something I did more than 2 years ago : Tic Tac Pills. Tic Tac is a brand of small and hard mints that are produced by the Ferrero (ITA), they are usually avaliable in all parts of the globe and you certainly already tasted some.
Today, these delicious mints come to L4D2 in 16 different flavors. The textures are genuine and brand new and HD. This addon doesn't includes custom sound because the original sounds fits the thing perfectly, so no conflict with your hypothetical sound mods.
Moreover, this mod is the first one that is not a remaster and that natively includes the "Pure RNG" System : there are multiple different boxes of Tic-Tac per map and you end up with the last one you picked or tried to pick :D. So much more variety =).
I did the textures myself because I couldn't find ultra HD ones, so all Tic-Tac boxes have native Full-HD graphics.
Everything being said, hit subscribe and just make sure that Louis doesn't eat them all'

Enjoy :)

Flavors are :
Freshmint
Spearmint Twist
Intense Mint
Orange
Green Apple
Cherry Passion
Strawberry Fields
Lime & Orange
Wintergreen
Apple Burst
Grapes
Banana (Minions)

Coconut Piña Colada (Mix)
Melon Mojito (Mix)
Freshmint (Gum)
Spearmint (Gum)
Cool Watermelon (Gum)
Cool Tropical (Gum)

13 different HD Tic Tac packs to replace the Pain Pills (Textures by me)
Pure RNG : multiple designs per map and the first person model matches the one you picked (most of the time)

Model : Martin Eloy Ocampos[www.sharecg.com]

There are 22 different Tic-Tac flavors. There are multiple ones per map and the one you pick matches the one you get. It can however sometimes change while in hand.

name: Charger Donkey Kong
author: LeftyGreenMario
description:
CEDA was hard at work monitoring at stopping the spread of illnesses, but they didn't bother monitoring the zoos or the tainted cartridges of the SNES game, Donkey Kong Country. One hideous ape, after seeing its zookeepers slowly turn into Boomers, got puked on, went into a fit of rage, and developed an intense craving for golden bananas and survivors that resemble nothing like golden bananas. It kidnapped a tiny monkey to serve as its companion. As they were both contanimated by the illnesses, the two adventured together, spreading their infection and turning people into Chargers, which resemble the hideous ape, and (with this mod at least) Jockeys, which resemble the tiny unfortunate monkey.

THIS IS NOT AN ORIGINAL MOD BY ME. I have one commenter calling out on me for theft, but just in case anyone would like to know, this mod is originally on gamemaps[www.gamemaps.com] by Splinks. The majority of the credit goes to this user. Metal King Boo[www.gamemaps.com] has provided the majority of the sound files for Donkey Kong Charger. My role here is separating the Donkey Kong Charger from the file in gamemaps while integrating the sound/music mod, with a few alterations by me, into a single, one-slot-over-Charger file for simple convenience.

While I appreciate feedback, this isn't my mod, ultimately.

After several requests of separating Donkey Kong mod from this rather popular add-on, guess what? I've finally done it. Enjoy. It does has some changes from the original mod (and Metal King Boo's sound mod), so it can work in conjunction with the (IMO) much-needed chargerbacteria.wav, contusion.wav, mortification.wav contusionhit.wav, and mortificationhit.wav.

Contains
-A flea infested tie-wearing kong that apparently expands his dong.
-Slightly different voices compared to the original. I thought they would be better suited and/or more hilarious, but none shouldn't be unfitting in case you hate unfitting noises. BUT, you get:
-Unfitting music for getting pounded, bacteria (roaming around music), getting charged on, when other people are pounded, and when other people are getting charged on. SPOILER ALERT: Contains disco music. The Trammps stuff, more specifically. Unfortunately, it's not Disco Inferno, but I think it's just as weird.

Like my totally (sarc) original mod? Rate and comment if needed! Also, check out my other mods if you like.

Perhaps one day, I'll include viewmodels for these things, but that's in the distant future. X\


Collection
*Check out this convenient collection for your Mario mods! Great if you're a Mario fan!

name: Halo 3 ODST Police Genet (Police Cars)
author: Adorabirb!
description:
"The police variant of the HuCiv Genet is a slightly larger variant than the civilian Genet, which was contracted HuCiv by a number of municipal law enforcement agencies to provide durable high-performance police interceptors based off of the Genet, including a compact, high-volume coupe, with several model trims ranging from eco-accessible, to track-ready. Like nearly all cars used, the Genet includes roadware that allows the car to pilot itself while driving and keeps the car connected to the planet's surveillance grid."

This mod replaces every police car in L4D2 with the Police Variant of the HuCiv Genet. it comes in multiple variants with 3 different body coats: Standard white, Black Coat with White trims, White coat with black trims. name: ToyZ 3
author: Mogabi
description:
A familiar place, am I dreaming? A town overun by the dead in what seems to be a large room. Whatever the current situation is, the infection must be dealt with first!

Theres a boat ride on the top of the bed, to activate it: Climb to the top of the tower on the bed castle.

thanks to Babblu for letting me use his minifigure and minature barrel cup models! Really appreciate it!

(This map is still in beta phase so expect bugs!)



A toy town in the middle of a bedroom



Introducing new ways of escaping, via teleporter or jumping off cliffs to safety



Side Notes:

Added a door to the map, unfortunately part of the map will go invisible if you go on the window with the computer and desk. This cannot be fixed.

Sorry about the acid, if you're the last person standing you'll most likely get acid on the moving platforms. Try moving around on the platforms, I made it harder for the acid to get you. (Tried including plugins to remove the acid but they require script mods.)

If you launch the map through the console, you might get a bunch of errors. Atleast I do, let me know if you get this bug. (Manually deleting the mod from your l4d2 directory and redownloading the file fixes it for me.)

Made this whenever I had time between college and work in secret haha. This might be my last map in a while since I have other things to focus on at the moment. But I will eventually get back to mapping. I will also be occasionally fixing any bugs. Thanks for all the support everybody! It is much appreciated!

If there are any bugs, comment them down below and I'll take a look at them.

If you look for the map in the add-ons, it will be called ToyZ 3, also in the survival lobby.

name: PD:TH Style HUD
author: tomaz
description:
PAYDAY: The Heist Style HUD

Not exactly a 1:1 recreation of the HUD, but similar, with my own little twist.

Features:
  • Similar PD:TH look
  • Teammate health counter
  • Local player and teammate panels aligned to the left.
  • Lowered weapon panel
  • Incapacitated icons

Support for (most) custom crosshairs has been added (Thanks ʟɪᴇϙᴜᴅᴇ!)
Check below for available custom crosshairs:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2213284571

Only replaces the local player, teammate and weapon panel.

NOTE:
  • If you have survivor skins installed, the game might say that there are conflicts with this HUD, but everything should be okay (some survivor skins have different named portrait texture files, which causes the survivor portrait to default to the original L4D2 one when incapped, not much I can do about it.)
  • This HUD is not guaranteed to work properly with a Steam Deck. L4D2 has specific parameters that are applied to certain UI elements when it detects that it's being played on a Steam Deck, since I do not own a Steam Deck, I am unable to check whether it looks okay or not.

Community made versions of this HUD:
  • PD:TH Style L4D1 HUD

Let me know of any problems.

I fully support & encourage edits of my mods, as long as I'm credited appropriately.

name: Glubtastic 4
author: Reliantlers
description:
The survivors thought they had destroyed the mysterious Sis, but they were wrong. After an anonymous tip, they board a zombie airbus to intercept top secret glub documents, containing the thickest plot yet.

This will be the final chapter of the Glubtastic series. Thanks for all the love & support!
If you encounter any errors please let me know in the comments.


--> R E A D___B E F O R E___P L A Y I N G <--

-There are a few custom animations for cut-scenes which may not play properly when running custom player models.

-If you crash it's likely due to another addon messing with the campaign. So please try and run MODLESS before blaming the maps. (Crashes are more likely caused by the 5000 anime avatars you've installed.)

-This campaign includes a versus mode, abit funky but it works.

-Checkpoints are used throughout these maps so don't worry if you die after certain hard sections. (On map 2 every door opened will persist.)

-I will not tell you spoilers on how to beat the maps, you must figure that out yourself.

-Running this on a dedicated server may cause issues with physics puzzles. Use a local host server to avoid this. (Stop using SourceMod to cheat lol)

-Keep in mind I made and tested these maps with friends, not bots. Bots are awful, bring friends. (Majority of people who complain of difficulty seem to be solo players, funny that.)

Previous Campaign: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2139756699

Although I've said this will be the final chapter I'm currently working on an offshoot map based in the Glubtastic style, I'm still interested in making more maps however I don't wanna just repeat Glubtastic again so am doing something abit different.

Mapping/Design - Dr. Face
Models/Assets - Dovy
Additional Assets - Reliantlers
Sis - Simploo

name: Glubtastic: Back 4 Glub
author: Reliantlers
description:
-- READ TO AVOID ISSUES --
-Before playing set "sv_consistency 0" in console or you may get an error related to the custom tank model.
-Disable mods that use high poly models like player or infected replacements etc to avoid hitting the vertices limit.
-The map/waves will not progress whilst someone is Idle.
-Survivor crates can only be picked up between waves.

After the collapse of the Sis-Dimension the L4D1 survivors wake to find themselves in the magical land of British where the zombies are beginning to attack. With the help of a familiar 'face' they must stop the many waves of zombies and find a way to escape Britland before it becomes overrun.

In this spin off instalment of the Glubtastic Cinematic Universe, you will fight the infected through 60 waves of increasing difficulty collecting points and purchasing weapons/upgrades along the way. Complete all waves and find the pieces for an escape vehicle to beat it.

This is not a survival map but rather a single map arcade styled campaign closer to that of a COD: Zombies match. Being this is quite a different design from the traditional Glubtastic campaigns i've called it 'Back 4 Glub' rather than 'Glubtastic 5'. However this is still the 5th Glubtastic instalment, featuring a bunch of the dumbness that is to be expected from this series.

Special thanks to Gov,nor GR££N & Lt. Rocky for additional playtesting.

name: Witch Execution Classic - Training Map
author: sense
description:
Most popular training map in L4D2 workshop.

First and only witch crowning training map, that will not just put you in a room with a witch and a shotgun (meh), but show where and when exactly you have to shoot that scum for 100% crowning in every possible situation.

Crystal blue button - spawn a witch
Green button - open room mode on/off

Tip: spawn the witch, get as close as possible to her and wait until she raises her head and/or neck above the glass shield - and then shoot. Aim for the neck, chin, higher part of a chest.

And if you're crazy enough, there're some melee weps.

╔═══════════════ HOW TO RUN THIS MAP ═════════════════════╗

While in the main menu - press ~ to open console.
If nothing happened - go to the Options - Keyboard - Developer Console - Enable.
Then get back to menu and press ~

Type in map sb_witch. Then press ENTER

╚═════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝

╔══════════ FAQ ON HOW TO FIX POSSIBLE BUGS ════════════╗

Q.: I spawned in an empty room / there are no weapons / I spawned as infected

A.: It appears that sometimes game fails to reset default playing mode to coop, which is the ONLY one we're looking for to successfully load and play this map. This often happens if you try to launch the map right after playing versus or survival modes, or playing on modded servers.

To fix this, just type in console

sv_cheats 1
mp_gamemode coop; map sb_witch
or
map sb_witch coop
or
map sb_witch campaign

These commands will force the map to load in cooperative mode. Don't worry about sv_cheats being set to 1. It's okay for local games, the only negative is that your achievements won't work while your playing this map. You don't have to change anything for playing normal multiplayer later, sv_cheats will automatically switch off.

╚══════════════════════════════════════════════════╝





SWOOPING BEARS - TRAINING MAPS COLLECTION

name: Hotline Miami - Biker [Francis]
author: Eden
description:
"You're dead meat" - Biker

"Biker, a former member of the 50 Blessings. Some of them don't know who he is but all they know that he has criminal background such as killing Russians Mafia for a living. Biker was "retired" and decide to move out from Miami to Fairfield just to take a break and start off on a new life. Although the infection outbreak started at Fairfield and was overrun by hordes of infected. But that didn't stop Biker and a thrilling opportunity to seek a new challenge just for hobbies. Biker finally does what he always do, hurting people infected."

Behold the actual Biker has arrived to L4D2! I give you Simkas/Hunterdnrc's Biker from Hotline Miami. It's not the actual model but it is inspired to be as a 3D model. Before saying anything or make any request, no I DID NOT create nor port this model to L4D2. I was messaged by one of my followers (The 80s Guy) and they requested me to help out some project. The porting was done by Eden Hazard and texture edits are made by me. I managed to enhance the texture of the model by adding skull patterns for his jacket and revamped some clothes. As always, HUD icons are also available in this mod. So enjoy playing as Biker and I would recommend download the Jacket mod for Louis so that way players could team up together as the Hotline Miami protagonist and kill some infected!

Thank you Eden Hazard for porting the model and be sure to check out his work!

Replace Francis

Garry's Mod original addon Gmod addon remove by the original author

Credits:
Eden Hazard - Porting model, textures, rigging, animation
Simkas/Hunterdnrc - Original model for Garry's Mod
Telltale Games - Vest model
Rockstar Games - Bike helmet model
Valve - Francis model
Scout_115 - Texture edit and new HUD icons

Whatever you do, don't noclip through his mask or else you'll face DEATH!

name: ToyZ 4
author: Mogabi
description:
The fourth insallment in the ToyZ series. I really reccommend putting your effect detail to high in order to see the targets, if its set to low or medium the targets cannot be seen from that close.

[paypal.me]

Originally posted by author:
If you like my work and would like to see more, you can support me directly by donating. And if not, a nice comment or feedback on my maps would be much appreciated. :) Thank you!



Now introducing Kings! Each toy castle has its own King, and all the thrones except one give you key items.


Find Coins all over the map to get health! There is no reward for collecting them all. :( But can be a fun challenge!


Now with more Traps! You will find more ways to counter the infected with these newly fun creative traps!



Boharox for lego textures ● Mysteli for lego models ● Dafiel for glas textures ● Stobe for beachball model ● Nayrbarr for medieval item props ● Morganicism for swtor ship ● 8sianDude for the pocky models ● II_Pyro_II for samsung_s7 model ● ♪ Grodbert for the pokemon substitute model



Since this was just released, do expect bugs, glitches, and errors. Since this is the biggest ToyZ map, the engine has its limits and I had to remove a lot of weapons, entities, props to make up for the entity limit within the engine. If I do update this map, I will try and make as many compromises I can for more content, but for now it is complete.

name: Hotline Miami Background
author: Dunkly
description:
This Add-on changes your background and music menu

How to Install:
-Make sure you are subscribed to the mod. Download it by starting up the game and then quit.

-You will need GCFScape to be able to open the .vpk file (C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\left 4 dead 2\left4dead2\addons\workshop)

-Click on the 2485377489.vpk file to open the file using GCFScape program.

-Extract the l4d2_background01 file to [C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\left 4 dead 2\left4dead2\media] and then replace the old file.

-When you are done, delete the 4 files l4d2_background02, l4d2_background03, l4d2_background04, l4d2_background05, then copy the l4d2_background01 (the mod) 4 times and rename the files l4d2_background02, l4d2_background03, l4d2_background04, l4d2_background05, this will replace the old files you deleted.

-You are now done!

Hope you enjoy the add-on!.

Menu icons:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2484578401

name: Burnout Revenge Cars (Prop)
author: AvengedDeathAlert
description:
My first PS2 game was Burnout Revenge, seems pretty late into the era. It has some of the most memorable cars instead of just being real-life cars knock-off.

This project started when I was still in university, but stopped due to PS2 models were badly ripped, then I found out years later that Xbox 360 version is superior both model and texture wise along with community scripts that made it easier to port.

Features
- Replaces most sedan, taxi, and police car props.
- Compatible with random tinting colors.
- Replaces a van type that also appears as news van and Dead Air event van.

Credits
- Criterion Games, Electronic Arts: Burnout Revenge
- Mati The Mudkip: Model Rip [gamemodels.ru]
